<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Intuitive Illusions](/Feats.aspx?ID=996) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Illusion Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=31)

**Trigger**
Your turn begins.

</column>

---

Illusion magic comes to you so naturally that you can effortlessly sustain your magical ruses. You immediately gain the effects of a [Sustain a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=73) action to extend the duration of one of your active illusion spells.
name: Intuitive Illusions
